WorkItem.ClosedComment: Bad data load, updated item cache from Armory corrects the issue. Wowhead will probably fix their database within a few days.
WorkItem.Description: I'm alliance, and horde items such as Illumination http://www.wowhead.com/?item=48036 are showing up on my lists. The faction info is correct/intact on Wowhead, but it's not being picked up on Rawr (faction says neutral on the item).
WorkItem.Summary: Opposite faction specific items showing up?

Comments.Message:
If it's correct/intact on Wowhead, have you tried right clicking on the item and reloading its data from Wowhead?  It may have been a bug on Wowhead's side.

Do this and comment back and let us know.

Reloaded from wowhead, didn't work. Reloaded from Armory, item disappeared.

Which is weird because if you go on the wowhead page I linked it clearly says "Side: Horde". Is rawr interpreting the info wrong?

Also, how would you suggest getting rid of all the horde items? Do a full update from the armory? Is this not happening for everyone?
I did a full update item cache from the armory, and this solved the problem.
